references.paper_title: Digiface-1m: 1 million digital face images for face recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale dataset of digital face images, providing a benchmark for evaluating face recognition models.

references.paper_title: Sface: Privacy-friendly and accurate face recognition using synthetic data
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for privacy-preserving face recognition using synthetic data, addressing a key challenge in the field.

references.paper_title: Idiff-face: Synthetic-based face recognition through fizzy identity-conditioned diffusion model
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art synthetic face recognition model based on diffusion models, showcasing advancements in generating high-quality synthetic face data.

references.paper_title: Arcface: Additive angular margin loss for deep face recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces a loss function that improves the performance of deep face recognition models, a crucial component of the work discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: Disentangled and controllable face image generation via 3d imitative-contrastive learning
references.reason: This paper presents a method for generating diverse and controllable face images, providing a foundation for the creation of synthetic datasets for face recognition.
